languages.text: {n}Паскаль чеканит:{/n} "Если данная единица преступит канон, да будут прерваны ее жизненные функции во имя Омниссии, который знает все, постигает все".
{n}Pasqal enunciates sharply,{/n} "Should this unit transgress against the canon, may its vital functions be terminated in the name of the Omnissiah, the all-knowing, the all-comprehending."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль чеканит:{/n} "Если данная единица преступит канон, да будут прерваны ее жизненные функции во имя Омниссии, который знает все, постигает все".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal enunciates sharply,{/n} "Should this unit transgress against the canon, may its vital functions be terminated in the name of the Omnissiah, the all-knowing, the all-comprehending."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡尖锐地开了口。{/n}“无所不知、无所不晓的欧姆尼塞亚在上，若是本单位违反了圣典，愿它的所有重要功能都被终止。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal enunciates sharply,{/n} "Should this unit transgress against the canon, may its vital functions be terminated in the name of the Omnissiah, the all-knowing, the all-comprehending."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡尖锐地开了口。{/n}“无所不知、无所不晓的欧姆尼塞亚在上，若是此单位违反了圣典，愿它的所有重要功能都被终止。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal declara en tono cortante:{/n} «Si esta unidad transgrede en contra del canon, que sus funciones vitales sean anuladas en nombre del Omnissiah, que lo sabe todo y lo comprende todo».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal enunciates sharply,{/n} "Should this unit transgress against the canon, may its vital functions be terminated in the name of the Omnissiah, the all-knowing, the all-comprehending."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal declara en tono cortante:{/n} «Si esta unidad transgrede en contra del canon, que sus funciones vitales sean anuladas en nombre del Omnissiah, que lo sabe todo y lo comprende todo».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルは鋭く告げる。{/n}「このユニットが正典に背くようなことがあれば、すべてを知り、すべてを包む万機神の名において、その重要な機能を停止させることができるだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal enunciates sharply,{/n} "Should this unit transgress against the canon, may its vital functions be terminated in the name of the Omnissiah, the all-knowing, the all-comprehending."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは鋭く告げる。{/n}「このユニットが正典に背くようなことがあれば、すべてを知り、すべてを包む万機神の名において、その重要な機能を停止させることができるだろう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal sagt mit übertrieben deutlicher Aussprache:{/n} "Sollte diese Einheit gegen den Kanon verstoßen, so mögen ihre Vitalfunktionen im Namen des Omnissiah, des Allwissenden und Allverstehenden terminiert werden."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal enunciates sharply,{/n} "Should this unit transgress against the canon, may its vital functions be terminated in the name of the Omnissiah, the all-knowing, the all-comprehending."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal sagt mit übertrieben deutlicher Aussprache:{/n} "Sollte diese Einheit gegen den Kanon verstoßen, so mögen ihre Vitalfunktionen im Namen des Omnissiah, des Allwissenden und Allverstehenden terminiert werden."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Si cette unité venait à transgresser le canon, que ses fonctions vitales soient interrompues au nom de l'Omnimessie, celui qui sait et comprend tout, » {n}répond Pasqal sur un ton sec.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal enunciates sharply,{/n} "Should this unit transgress against the canon, may its vital functions be terminated in the name of the Omnissiah, the all-knowing, the all-comprehending."

traits.locale_text: « Si cette unité venait à transgresser le canon, que ses fonctions vitales soient interrompues au nom de l'Omnimessie, celui qui sait et comprend tout, » {n}répond Pasqal sur un ton sec.{/n}
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal enunciates sharply,{/n} "Should this unit transgress against the canon, may its vital functions be terminated in the name of the Omnissiah, the all-knowing, the all-comprehending."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, keskin bir şekilde konuşuyor.{/n} "Bu birim nizamnameye aykırı hareket ederse hayati fonksiyonları; her şeyi bilen, her şeyi idrak eden Hermesih adına imha edilsin."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal enunciates sharply,{/n} "Should this unit transgress against the canon, may its vital functions be terminated in the name of the Omnissiah, the all-knowing, the all-comprehending."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal keskin bir şekilde konuşuyor:{/n} "Bu birim eğer ki nizama aykırı hareket ederse, hayati fonksiyonları her şeyi bilen, her şeyi idrak eden Hermesih adına imha edilsin."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
